channel.title: cloud native on dpritchett.net by Daniel Pritchett
channel.description: Recent content in cloud native on dpritchett.net by Daniel Pritchett

item.title: Revisiting the Agile Manifesto in a Post-DevOps World
item.description: Agile in the age of serverless, “cloud native”, and continuous delivery I’ve been reading through a bunch of lean manufacturing and DevOps literature recently, namely The Goal, The Phoenix Project (again!), and now Continuous Delivery. The Agile Manifesto is referred to a good bit in the latter two texts, and it’s gotten me wondering how well the seventeen-year old chestnuts hold up. Taken as a whole, the manifesto feels timeless and every bit as relevant as it was at the dawn of this new century.
